duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and evaluate student programs, maintaining high AMI Montessori standards.
Hire and manage teaching and non-teaching staff, oversee compensation and training.
Recommend enrollment objectives, establish standards for admissions, oversee marketing and admissions.
Encourage participation in school events, liaise with educational institutions and associations.
Analyze school needs and create short-, mid-, and long-term goals and planning.
Present financial plans and budgets, make recommendations for tuition rates and salary adjustments.
Advise the Board on fundraising needs and plans, coordinate fundraising efforts and events, and grant applications.
Supervise the operation and maintenance of the school's campus, recommend changes to maintain standards of appearance and safety.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in elementary education, early childhood, educational administration, business management, or related field; Master’s degree preferred.
